channel.title: How can add ppl attack in wild ? .. testscape
channel.description:
how can i add people attack where they want in wild ..cuz when i'm trying to attack someone that are higher me in combat is says u need to move deeper ..but i was at lvl 54 wild.. :eek: help how to fix it :|
+ if somebody knows how to add Npc's attack with gfx .. plz type in it here
